subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees had known for months they would be the hosts of the 2008 All-Star Game during their final season at Yankee Stadium, but Commissioner Bud Selig made it official on Wednesday.
snippet: The Yankees had known for months they would be the hosts of the 2008 All-Star Game during their final season at Yankee Stadium, but Commissioner Bud Selig made it official on Wednesday.
